cons: Eating too many could have side effects on your weight, blood pressure and gastrointestinal tract.
description: Pistachios help in reducing bad cholesterol, LDL and increases good cholesterol, HDL in the body thus preventing heart diseases.
It also increases strength of the nerves making heart stronger.
Pistachio benefits include the presence of vitamin A, vitamin E and anti-inflammatory properties reducing the inflammation in the body caused due to any problems.
Pistachios helps in breaking down proteins into amino acids resulting in glucose tolerance.

Vitamin B6 is the protein that helps in carrying oxygen in the blood. The high quantity of B6 in pistachios if taken daily can increase the oxygen quantity in the blood and increase the haemoglobin count in it.
Vitamin B6 is present in high concentration in pistachios which is very beneficial to nervous system.
name: Pistachio
pros: Pistachios help in reducing bad cholesterol, LDL and increases good cholesterol, HDL in the body thus preventing heart diseases.
It also increases strength of the nerves making heart stronger.
Pistachio benefits include the presence of vitamin A, vitamin E and anti-inflammatory properties reducing the inflammation in the body caused due to any problems.
Pistachios helps in breaking down proteins into amino acids resulting in glucose tolerance.

Vitamin B6 is the protein that helps in carrying oxygen in the blood. The high quantity of B6 in pistachios if taken daily can increase the oxygen quantity in the blood and increase the haemoglobin count in it.
Vitamin B6 is present in high concentration in pistachios which is very beneficial to nervous system.
For weight loss, and improved bowel function you must include these nuts in your regular diet.

Type 1 diabetes, metabolic syndrome, erectile dysfunction, stroke, dementia, allergies, arthritis, other immune problems, etc., can be prevented or treated to some extent with the regular consumption of these nuts.
These nuts are rich in phytosterols. This help in bringing down the levels of LDL 'bad' cholesterol in the body.
Pistachios have a low glycemic index, which might promote lower blood sugar levels.
